Salesforce Components - HttpUtils
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Groups    Index




Class HttpUtils

public class HttpUtils

Description: Methods to send callouts from Apex References:

Changes

11/15/2016 Initial version. 05/21/2017 Methods createHttpRequest and sendHttpRequest now accepts IntegrationDataTools.RequestSettings. 04/03/2021 Request class. 04/11/2021 Request class: Endpoint is now of the UrlGenerator type to better manage Url parameters. 04/11/2021 addEndpointUriSuffix method: Endpoint suffix is now supported to manually add parameters (same parameter multiple times when required). 04/11/2021 addParameter: Parameters can be added using the UrlGenerator to the endpoint. 08/09/2021 Request.addHeaderAuthorizationBearer(): Makes it easier to add the bearer authorization header. 08/09/2021 Request.addHeaderContentTypeJson(): Makes it easier to add json content header. 09/11/2021 Class RequestSettings moved from main class IntegrationDataTools. 09/11/2021 Send request methods now use custom metadata code settings instead of RequestsSettings__c. 10/02/2021 RequestSettings class and related methods were removed. 02/23/2023 HttpResult now returns the property additional_info with method getAdditionalInfo(). 11/12/2023 sendHttpRequest(): result now includes the stack trace if exception. 03/03/2024 addEndpointBaseUri(): If the endpoint is already set, add the base uri to the existing endpoint, otherwise create a new endpoint. 03/03/2024 addEndpointPath(): Add a path to the endpoint Uri.
